heading: CBSE Class 10 – Your Gateway to Success
subHeading: Comprehensive board exam preparation with NCERT-aligned content and practice
quickIntro: CBSE Class 10 is a crucial milestone in a student's academic journey, featuring the first board examination experience. This year focuses on building a strong foundation in core subjects, developing analytical skills, and preparing students for future academic pursuits. The curriculum is designed to test conceptual understanding and application of knowledge.

preparationTips.title: Board Exam Preparation Tips
tips: Follow a well-structured study plan covering all subjects
Focus on NCERT textbooks as they are the primary resource for board exams
Practice previous years' question papers and sample papers
Take regular mock tests to improve time management
Make concise notes for quick revision before exams
Focus on diagrams, flowcharts, and important formulas
Maintain a healthy study routine with proper breaks
Stay calm and confident during the exam
